titles.title: Defending Americans from Authoritarian Digital Currencies Act
Defending Americans from Authoritarian Digital Currencies Act
A bill to prohibit the use of the digital currency payment system operated by the Government of the People's Republic of China, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Defending Americans from Authoritarian Digital Currencies Act
This bill prohibits app stores in the United States from carrying or supporting any app that allows transactions using the Chinese government's Digital Currency Electronic Payment system (e-CNY). App stores also may not support or enable transactions in e-CNY in their app stores.
